              his
               
              heirs
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              crown
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
What
               
              is
               
              it
               
              but
               
              to
               
              make
               
              thy
               
              sepulcher

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              creep
               
              into
               
              it
               
              far
               
              before
               
              thy
               
              time
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Warwick
               
              is
               
              Chancellor
               
              and
               
              the
               
              lord
               
              of
               
              Callice
              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Stern
               
              Falconbridge
               
              commands
               
              the
               
              Narrow
               
              Seas
              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
The
               
              Duke
               
              is
               
              made
               
              Protector
               
              of
               
              the
               
              realm
              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              yet
               
              shalt
               
              thou
               
              be
               
              safe
              ?
               
              Such
               
              safety
               
              finds

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
The
               
              trembling
               
              lamb
               
              environèd
               
              with
               
              wolves
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Had
               
              I
               
              been
               
              there
              ,
               
              which
               
              am
               
              a
               
              silly
               
              woman
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
The
               
              soldiers
               
              should
               
              have
               
              tossed
               
              me
               
              on
               
              their
               
              pikes

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Before
               
              I
               
              would
               
              have
               
              granted
               
              to
               
              that
               
              act
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
But
               
              thou
               
              preferr’st
               
              thy
               
              life
               
              before
               
              thine
               
              honor
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              seeing
               
              thou
               
              dost
              ,
               
              I
               
              here
               
              divorce
               
              myself

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Both
               
              from
               
              thy
               
              table
              ,
               
              Henry
              ,
               
              and
               
              thy
               
              bed
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Until
               
              that
               
              act
               
              of
               
              Parliament
               
              be
               
              repealed

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Whereby
               
              my
               
              son
               
              is
               
              disinherited
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
The
               
              northern
               
              lords
               
              that
               
              have
               
              forsworn
               
              thy
               
              colors

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Will
               
              follow
               
              mine
               
              if
               
              once
               
              they
               
              see
               
              them
               
              spread
              ;

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              spread
               
              they
               
              shall
               
              be
              ,
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              foul
               
              disgrace

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              utter
               
              ruin
               
              of
               
              the
               
              house
               
              of
               
              York
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Thus
               
              do
               
              I
               
              leave
               
              thee
              .
              —
              Come
              ,
               
              son
              ,
               
              let’s
               
              away
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Our
               
              army
               
              is
               
              ready
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              we’ll
               
              after
               
              them
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Stay
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              Margaret
              ,
               
              and
               
              hear
               
              me
               
              speak
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Thou
               
              hast
               
              spoke
               
              too
               
              much
               
              already
              .
               
              Get
               
              thee
               
              gone
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Gentle
               
              son
               
              Edward
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              stay
               
              with
               
              me
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              to
               
              be
               
              murdered
               
              by
               
              his
               
              enemies
              !

speaker:
PRINCE
               
              EDWARD
text:
When
               
              I
               
              return
               
              with
               
              victory
               
              from
               
              the
               
              field
              ,

speaker:
PRINCE
               
              EDWARD
text:
I’ll
               
              see
               
              your
               
              Grace
              .
               
              Till
               
              then
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              follow
               
              her
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Come
              ,
               
              son
              ,
               
              away
              .
               
              We
               
              may
               
              not
               
              linger
               
              thus
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Poor
               
              queen
              !
               
              How
               
              love
               
              to
               
              me
               
              and
               
              to
               
              her
               
              son

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Hath
               
              made
               
              her
               
              break
               
              out
               
              into
               
              terms
               
              of
               
              rage
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Revenged
               
              may
               
              she
               
              be
               
              on
               
              that
               
              hateful
               
              duke
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Whose
               
              haughty
               
              spirit
              ,
               
              wingèd
               
              with
               
              desire
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Will
               
              cost
               
              my
               
              crown
              ,
               
              and
               
              like
               
              an
               
              empty
               
              eagle

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Tire
               
              on
               
              the
               
              flesh
               
              of
               
              me
               
              and
               
              of
               
              my
               
              son
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              loss
               
              of
               
              those
               
              three
               
              lords
               
              torments
               
              my
               
              heart
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I’ll
               
              write
               
              unto
               
              them
               
              and
               
              entreat
               
              them
               
              fair
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Come
              ,
               
              cousin
              ,
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              the
               
              messenger
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              I
              ,
               
              I
               
              hope
              ,
               
              shall
               
              reconcile
               
              them
               
              all
              .
